description:
Shelter blew over in storm force winds and was damaged.  Quality and Safety issue.                             Various suggestion on avoidance including:                                                                                           
store inside when we know a storm is coming, stored in sheltered areas, store parallel to prevailing wind, so less of the shelter catches the wind, strap them down somehow

description:
Requested to supply 2no 4.2m3 booster pumps at max 8 bar pressure from supplier (APS Fluid).
Pumps supplied did not match the pump curved given to us and were from different manufacturer. 
Pumps fitted on site but were blowing pressure relief valves down stream.
Contacted supplier numerous times by phone and email but failed to reply to us.
Current fix is to supply 2no VSDs to pump which we have ordered from NORD.
1:
Requested to supply 2no 4.2m3 booster pumps at max 8 bar pressure from supplier (APS Fluid).
Pumps supplied did not match the pump curved given to us and were from different manufacturer. 
Pumps fitted on site but were blowing pressure relief valves down stream.
Contacted supplier numerous times by phone and email but failed to reply to us.
Current fix is to supply 2no VSDs to pump which we have ordered from NORD.

description: RTPI pole released to production. An error occured where the holes were not present in the pole. This should have been down at the rotolas stage. The process routing was changed to include Doosan machining to drill this hole. The next batch of RTPI poles still has the Doosan step on it even though it wasn't required.
